greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Positions of negative coefficients in cyclotomic polynomial Phi_n(x), A063698 in binary.
link: Index entries for cyclotomic polynomials, positions of coefficients
example: E.g. Phi_15(x) = x^8 - x^7 + x^5 - x^4 + x^3 - x + 1, thus the 1-bits of a(15) are at positions 1,4 and 7, thus we get a(15) = 10010010
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 03 2001
